description: Standard table definitions for bridge protocols, including pool-based, mint-based, and intent-based bridges.

tables.description: List of tokens in bridge protocols.

tokenAddress.description: The contract address of the token.

chainId.description: The blockchain ID where the token resides.

tables.description: List of pools in bridge protocols (applicable .

creationTimestamp.description: The timestamp this pool was created.

creationBlockNumber.description: The block number this pool was created on.

token0Address.description: The contract address of token 0 (in a pool based bridge). Use this as the tokenAddress for an intent-based bridge.

token1Address.description: (Optional, only applicable to pool-based) The contract address of token 1.

feeRate.description: The fee rate as a percentage for the pool, if applicable (ie, 2.3% fee as 2.3).

poolAddress.description: The contract address of the pool.

chainId.description: Standard chain ID (ie, the chain ID of the network the pool lives on).

bridgeType.description: The type of bridge (ie, pool-based, mint-based, or intent-based).

tables.description: List of liquidity providers in pool-based bridge protocols.

lpAddress.description: The address of the liquidity provider.

token0Amount.description: The amount of token 0, decimal normalized.

token1Amount.description: The amount of token 1, decimal normalized.

tvlUsd.description: The total value locked in USD.

chainId.description: The standard chain ID where the liquidity provider resides.

bridgeType.description: The type of bridge (pool-based, mint-based, or intent-based).

tables.description: User level snapshot of accounts that have used the bridge (applicable to pool and intent based bridges).

poolAddress.description: (Optional, only applicable to pool-based) The contract address of the pool.

userAddress.description: The address of the user this snapshot activity is based on.

amountInUsd.description: The amount of tokens received on this network by the user in USD during the given snapshot.

amountOutUsd.description: The amount of tokens sent out of this network by the user in USD during the given snapshot.

chainId.description: The standard chain ID where the bridger resides.

bridgeType.description: The type of bridge (pool-based, mint-based, or intent-based).

tables.description: Pool level snapshots for pool and mint based bridges.

poolAddress.description: The contract address of the pool.

token0Address.description: (Optional, only applicable to pool-based) The contract address of token 0.

token0Amount.description: The amount of token 0, decimal normalized.

token1Amount.description: The amount of token 1, decimal normalized.

tvlUsd.description: The total value locked in USD, at this snapshot.

volumeUsd.description: The bridged volume in USD, during this snapshot.

feesUsd.description: The fees collected in USD, during the snapshot period.

incentiveAmount.description: The amount of incentives given out during this snapshot period, decimal normalized.

incentiveUsd.description: The value of incentives in USD.

chainId.description: The standard chain ID where the pool resides.

bridgeType.description: The type of bridge (pool-based, mint-based, or intent-based).

tables.description: Protocol level snapshot for all bridges.

tvlUsd.description: (Optional, not applicable to intent-based bridges) The total value locked in USD, at this snapshot.

volumeUsd.description: The volume in USD, during this given snapshot period.

feesUsd.description: The fees collected in USD, during the snapshot period.

chainId.description: The standard chain ID where the protocol resides.

bridgeType.description: The type of bridge (pool-based, mint-based, or intent-based).

blockNumber.description: The block number of the transaction.

transactionHash.description: The hash of the transaction this bridge originated from.

volumeUsd.description: The volume of the transaction in USD.

userAddress.description: The address of the user initiating the transaction.

solverAddress.description: The address of the solver (for intent-based bridges).

poolAddress.description: The address of the pool (for pool-based and mint-based bridges).

bridgeType.description: The type of bridge (pool-based, mint-based, or intent-based).

tables.description: List of makers in intent-based bridge protocols.

amountInUsd.description: The amount received in USD, during this snapshot.

amountOutUsd.description: The amount sent in USD, during this given snapshot.

feesUsd.description: The fees collected in USD, during this snapshot.

chainId.description: The standard chain ID where the maker resides.

tables.description: List of takers in intent-based bridge protocols.

volumeUsd.description: The volume bridged in USD, in the given snapshot.

chainId.description: The standard chain ID where the taker resides.

tables.description: Volume and fees data at the token level for intent-based bridges.

tokenAddress.description: The contract address of the token.

volumeUsd.description: The volume in USD, during the given period.

feesUsd.description: The fees collected in USD, during this given period.

chainId.description: The standard chain ID where the token resides.
